head.title: Huntington Beach Union High School District

meta.name: description
meta.content: Huntington Beach Union High School District is a public school district serving portions of the Orange County cities of Huntington Beach, Fountain Valley, and Westminster. It oversees eleven sites, offering courses for students in grades 9-12.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Huntington Beach Union High School District, HBUHSD

article.aria-label: Parent University Class - Lessons Learned From the Field

h3.a: Parent University Class - Lessons Learned From the Field

div.div: View wellness information under Students & Families for resources and newsletters!
Newest update 4/2/20 - campuses closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 academic year
Online enrichment activities in all subjects are now available for all of our students!
Meals will be available for all students at OVHS & WHS pick up sites. See the flyer for more details.
The HBUHSD Board of Trustees voted to close schools effective March 16, 2020, through March 27, 2020. Read more here.

div.span: of Graduates attend a 4 year college
students involved in sports, clubs & activities

div.div: We will educate, prepare, and inspire our students to change the world.

section.div: Huntington Beach Union High School District

div.div: Created by our very own students and staff from Fountain Valley High School's (FVHS) Baron Broadcast News, this video offers an in-depth look at what makes us, the Huntington Beach Union High School District (HBUHSD), a top-notch place to learn, work, and live.
